"<%me>. I have been waiting for you.": "I know why you're here. This way."
"I wanted to contact you from this end, but he stopped me, saying it's dangerous..."
"Your guest is here, Rogio."
"<%me>! We finally meet again...!"
"Wai- no, stop! You wounds will reopen!"
"Ouch, ouch... <%me>, you're fine. I'm so glad..."
"I thought you've been targeted too."
"I'll get straight to the point. ARKS is hiding something on planet Naberius."
"They wanted to silence me, which is why I'm hiding here now."
"But... This is embarrassing, but I can't recall how I was rescued."
"A while ago, an ARKS member brought a wounded Rogio to me."
"That small girl told me to hide him, and disappeared after that."
"I'm not sure if something's happened, but I can sense danger."
"The truth is that I was almost murdered to keep something in the dark."
"If there were something hidden in the tundra area, then access would be restricted."
"However, ARKS are allowed free access to the entire area. So what red flag did I set off?"
"The parameters I measured during the geological survey seems to be the mostly likely cause."
"The samples from the tundra had traces of Darkers in them. And pretty deep."
"Which would mean that Darkers have been on Naberius for quite a long time."
"That alone might not be too surprising. But there was one more thing..."
"That tundra itself might have been caused by Darkers."
"I haven't been able to wrap my head around the whole picture yet."
"However, I must have done something to touch on some secret of the ARKS."
"A Darker is the cause of the tundra. A seemingly massive one, at that. There was something else..."
"Sorry, I can't remember. I'll have to look into it some more."
